Posts.Content: nipple views are taken when they haven't been able to get the nipple in profile. this means that they haven't been able to see directly behind the nipple on the pictures that they have taken. They would not do any extra pictures in screening if they saw something, its just the standard 4 pictures. hope this helps Report Reply
Posts.Title: Had three scans on both breasts at my regular screening

Posts.Content: black areas could be breast cysts or even your ribs or areas of normal breast tissue the lobules in the breasts can look like little pockets. if the big black areas were of concern a biopsy would of been done. cancer is not necessarily obvious on an ultrasound and takes a lot of training to pick it up. He obviously just doesn't have a very good bedside manner. hope this helps Report Reply
